title: my LOL wont start
body: ive tried doing the task manager thing and restarting  my computer  even re installing the application but nothing has worked it just shows the league logo and closes the application, HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Often times when League won't launch properly, it's caused by Windows not granting proper permissions to it. Since League interacts with a ton of files and certain software packages outside of the League installation, it needs system permissions to be able to take certain actions. Our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) addresses the most common fixes for this and it's a great starting point in troubleshooting this issue. 

Let me know if you continue to have problems after working through those steps.

This sounds weird but you might want to give it a shot--
Try holding down on <numlock> while you see the logo (or maybe before it, if that time window is too short).  I had that problem a while back, and believe it or not that's what did it for me.

If you still have trouble, this forum article
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3856920
is pretty extensive and may very well hold a solution for you
